name: HepatitisBVirusInfectionTestsForHepatitisBVirusTotalCoreAntibody
title: Hepatitis B Virus Infection (Tests for Hepatitis B Virus Total Core Antibody)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Hepatitis B Total Core Antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Total Core Antibody),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
